price: Sila gabbaramtoota (gabbaran), dachii irraa godhatuu? kanneen (namoota) du’aa kaasan,
arabic: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُوٓاْ ءَالِهَةٗ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ هُمۡ يُنشِرُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: ami ittakhadhū ālihatan mina al-arḍi hum yunshirūna
